#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int ctoi(char ch){ return((int)ch - 48);}
char itoc(int i){  return((char)(i + 48));}
string strrev(string s){return(string(s.rbegin(),s.rend()));}
string multiply(string n1,string n2)
{
string mult;
int carry=0;

      reverse(n1.rbegin(),n1.rend());
      reverse(n2.rbegin(),n2.rend());   
      
      if(n2.length()>n1.length())
       {
            string s = n1;
            n1 =n2;
            n2 =s;                     
       }
      
for(int i=0;i<n2.length();i++)
{          
carry =0;   
for(int j=0;j<n1.length();j++)   
 {            
       int x = ctoi(n2[i]) * ctoi(n1[j]) + carry;              
       if(i==0)         
         mult.insert(mult.end(),itoc(x%10));              
       else
        {        
        if(i+j>=mult.length())mult.insert(mult.end(),itoc(0));        
         x =  ctoi(mult[i+j]) + x;                                                         
         mult[i+j] = itoc(x %10);                      
        }                                     
        carry = x/10;       
        
 }  
 if(carry) 
 mult.insert(mult.end(),itoc(carry));                   
}

int i=0;
mult = strrev(mult);

while(1)
 if(mult[0]=='0') mult.erase(0,1);
 else break;


if(!mult.length())mult.insert(mult.begin(),'0');
return(mult);
}

int main()
{
    int t;cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
              bool flag = false;
              string str1,str2;
              cin>>str1>>str2;
              if(str1[0] == '-')
              {              
               str1.erase(str1.begin());
               flag = true;
              } 
              if(str2[0] == '-')               
              {
               str2.erase(str2.begin());
               flag=!flag;
              }
              if(flag)cout<<"-";
              cout<<multiply(str1,str2)<<endl;
    }
    system("pause");
    return(0);
}
